entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: WSW 31 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
